import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import AuthUser from '../AuthUser'; const Sidebar = () => { const {http} = AuthUser(); const [userdetail,setUserdetail] = useState(''); const [logout,setLogout] = useState(''); useEffect(()=>{ fetchUserDetail(); Logout(); },[]); const fetchUserDetail = () =>{ http.post('/me').then((res)=>{ setUserdetail(res.data); }); } const Logout = () =>{ http.post('/logout').then((res)=>{ setLogout(res.data); }); } return (
{/* /. NAV TOP */}

{userdetail.name}

{/* /. NAV SIDE */}
); } export default Sidebar;
